summary: This is the film of The Who's appearance at the third (and final) Isle of Wight festival in 1970. This is regarded as the band's finest performance.
cast: Roger Daltrey|John Entwistle|Keith Moon|Pete Townshend|Ricki Farr|Jimi Hendrix|Kris Kristofferson|Taste
title: Listening to You: The Who at the Isle of Wight 1970
